name: David Linsin
tagline: husband & cat owner • iOS Developer • co-founder of furryfishApps • fan of the New York Rangers
body:
### Bio
David is a versatile developer with an eye for perfection. He started his career as a Java developer and is now pursuing his current passion iOS development. Together with his wife he co-founded [furryfishApps](http://furryfishapps.com), a small independent iOS App shop. They create addictive games and stunning apps. Their latest app [LinkEver](http://furryfishapps.com/linkever) recently hit the App Store. His day job is spearheading the iOS and Android app development team at [grandcentrix GmbH](http://grandcentrix.net) in Cologne.

### More

* Twitter: [@dlinsin](http://twitter.com/dlinsin)
* coderwall: [dlinsin](http://coderwall.com/dlinsin)
* old ramblings: [dlinsin-archive.github.com](https://github.com/dlinsin/dlinsin-archive.github.com/tree/master/_posts) 
* older rambling: [dlinsin.blogspot.com](http://dlinsin.blogspot.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
